enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Deals bonus damage to all bug-like creatures
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces amount of damage taken from explosions
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: During thunderstorms, hitting an enemy will strike it with a lightning bolt from the sky
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: Item will disappear on your death
enchantment.minecraft.efficiency.desc: Increases tools mining speed and chance of disabling shield if applied to axe
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduces fall and ender pearl teleportation damage
enchantment.minecraft.fire_aspect.desc: On melee attack, sets target ablaze
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces all fire damage taken and burn time
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc: Arrows shot are set ablaze and will ignite enemies or tnt blocks
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Blocks, that do not drop itself, have a chance of increased drops
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.desc: Will freeze water under your feet
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Increases amount of damage dealt to aquatic mobs
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Prevents consumption of arrows. Requires at least one arrow in your inventory to function
enchantment.minecraft.knockback.desc: Enemies will be knocked back further
enchantment.minecraft.looting.desc: Chance of additional drops on mob kill
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.desc: Trident will return to you after being thrown
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Increases chance of obtaining treasure while fishing
enchantment.minecraft.lure.desc: Fish will bite your fishing hook more often
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: Repairs item by consuming picked up experience points. Will not consume XP from you XP bar
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc: Shoots three arrows at same time. Consumes only one arrow
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc: Your shoots pierce multiple enemies and shields
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces damage taken from direct projectile impacts
enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Reduces all instances of damage taken except hunger and warden sonic booms
enchantment.minecraft.punch.desc: Arrows will knockback enemies further on impact
enchantment.minecraft.quick_charge.desc: Reduces amount of time it takes to re-arm crossbow
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Replaces trident throw with trident dash, that will launch you in a direction you looking, but it works only in water or rain
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Block mined will it drop itself instead of its normal drops. Works on most, but not all blocks
enchantment.minecraft.smite.desc.desc: Deal bonus damage to undead enemies such as zombies and skeletons, but not limited to them
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Walking on soul soil or soul sand will give you speed boost
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping.desc: Enemies around main target also take part of initial damage
enchantment.minecraft.swift_sneak.desc: Reduces movement speed penalty while sneaking
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Enemies will take half to two hearts of damage while attacking you
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Item has a chance of avoiding durability loss each item it being used or damaged
